name: Land Fold
description:
What an amazing land you will find once you unfold it?

Drag each colored block to extend it and fill all the spaces in proper order. It will be a little challengeable when the colors get more and the blocks go irregular. Use your brain to find the correct moves.

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Family-friendly content: pictures fun for adults and kids
* Enjoy the smoothing symmetry.
